long_description: Get dogmatic in your quest to accessorize with the Chaco Dog Leash. Made from sturdy Chaco webbing with an ultra-durable buckle, the leash might even match your sandals. 6 ft. leash is made from Chaco's sturdy polyester webbing. New self-latching antiqued-metal clasp with easy release. Ultra-durable plastic Chaco buckle. Width of size small is .75 in.; width of size large is 1 in. The Chaco Dog Leash comes in assorted colors and patterns that match the Chaco Dog Collar (sold separately). Machine washable.
short_description: Get dogmatic in your quest to accessorize with the Chaco Dog Leash. Made from sturdy Chaco webbing with an ultra-durable buckle, the leash might even match your sandals.
